website_summaries.verdict: A quality shatterproof frame design with a mat that helps create a custom look.
pros: This gets top marks for being sturdy and shatterproof
It also stands out for its eye-catching mat, and users report it is easy to install and hang as well
cons: This frame uses acrylic rather than glass, and some consumers reported issues with the acrylic portion being scratched on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Solid, uniform quality -- the acrylic doesn't look cheap or noticeable
customer_reviews.text: I bought three for pictures of my kids in our hallway. I had frames with glass, which proved to be a mess when a light saber duel knocked one off the wall. The acrylic are definitely lighter, but they still look and feel solid. I'm very pleased with the purchase. They surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: JuleNY

customer_reviews.title: Not glass
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased similar black frames and should have looked up exactly the type I previously bought. This frame is nice, but it is definitely "cheap" and it is a piece of plastic covering the photo, not glass. I was truly disappointed in that feature. It is not worth my time to send it back so I will use it as is. I would not gift this to someone as it is not, in my opinion, a giftable item. Certainly not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cope

customer_reviews.title: Great Frames, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with these frames. The price was incredibly good and they look just as good as more expensive frames. I used them to frame some printed pictures in my daughter's nursery and the project turned out even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby17

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap Because It's Super Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning because it was so cheap and tacky looking. I knew the front would be acrylic but still did not love it. And the back of the frame wasn't even painted. I know no one is going to look at the back but as it was meant to be a present for a friend I just couldn't stand it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Marie

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This was broken upon arrival. I needed it for a gift that was coming up too soon for me to return it. I noticed that the peel off sheet seems to have already been picked at but ignored that. Once I finish putting the thing together, I realized there was a chip on the frame. This was probably previously returned and then resold. The frame itself also looks/feels cheaper. Instead of glass, it has some clear plastic sheet protecting the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased inexpensive prints, and didn't want to spend more than the prints on the frame. I'm happy with these frames - I will note, I did not know that the "glass" would be acrylic, but it looks good, so I don't mind it. Also, the acrylic has a film on either side when it shows up - I didn't realize this at first, so I thought the acrylic was a bit spotty. Once I figured out that I needed to remove the film, I was glad they'd put it there - the acrylic is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice frames and was the perfect match and fit for a couple of prints purchased also on Amazon. These are saved in my "wish list" for future reference! The "glass" is actually plexiglass (?) and had a protective film on both sides. Once the film is removed, it looks as nice as glass and, thankfully, isn't as heavy as glass! Nice frames and nice price - how can you go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: bbkatt

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I expected!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very pleased with this frame; it had the hanging sawtooth already attached and I liked the color. However the one (major) flaw is the acrylic cover. It is flimsy and mine had scratches on it (even though there was film wrap attached) so there was no way anything I framed would be acceptable. Some advice for would-be DYI framers -- like so many things, it is not as easy as it looks. If you can afford to have your precious photos or whatever professionally framed -- do it! I am not going to bother returning the frame but will chalk it up as a learning experience!
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great frames for office space. Light and easy to hang. FYI frames do not include a glass....it’s a plastic substitute. Which you cannot notice once artwork is hung.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Two small issues removed one star from an otherwise perfect product. First
customer_reviews.text: Two small issues removed one star from an otherwise perfect product. First: The frame will leave black marks on a wall, but a magic eraser will take care of that. So be aware of that if you're a renter. Second: They're not the same exact size. They're very close, but if you're a perfectionist and want everything lined up just right the frames may cause some issues for you. I'm going to be buying some more soon!
customer_reviews.author: G.Hans

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC NOT GLASS
customer_reviews.text: Are you serious? This is what ~$15 gets you these days?? Frame and backing are fine, mating looks ok, NOT GLASS. VERY VERY VERY CHEAP PLASTIC! Easy to scratch, flimsy. Will not buy another. Not at this price for this product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: This frame doesn't make you bend little metal clips to access the area where the picture goes, it has little rotating pieces that hold everything together. I thought I wouldn't like the plastic instead of glass, but it's beautiful and clear.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: didn't look quite the same
customer_reviews.text: upon close inspection, this looks like a very cheap plastic frame. Was going to give it as a gift, but I will not be as it looks too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality as well as customer service
customer_reviews.text: The black paint on this frame left marks all over my hands and stained my sweater. In addition, without realizing that my hands were covered in black paint, I touched the mat while placing my picture in the frame and it left prints on the mat. I called customer service for Golden State Art and they told me that the quality of their product is not there problem and to contact Amazon. I was floored. Terrible quality as well as customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely beautiful. I love this frame
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful. I love this frame. It was pretty cheap on here compared to other places. I love it! I put a drawing my grandmother did in it and it looks beautiful with the white frame!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hemminger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful frame for such a low price. I was surprised that it was still in one piece apon arrival after reading some of the reviews but I will be buying again for sure! Made my photo from etsy look great
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, used these to frame name stories prints for my granddaughters. Excellent price. Plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: There was film on both sides of the "glass" that needed to be removed. Once they were gone, this looked very crisp and classy. I used it to frame an anniversary present and have every intention of ordering more for pictures and wall hangings. This was a much cheaper but just as nice looking option than buying a custom frame and mat at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H

customer_reviews.title: Classic frame with plastic insert
customer_reviews.text: Its stylish, but I didn't realize it wasnt glass. The panel is sturdy double sided plastic, not glass. Durable, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as portrayed on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Will use this to frame a poster from a show I directed.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Levine Thal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This frame is perfect! I had pictures that were printed on 8 1/2 x 11 inch paper. There was room for me to hide a little bit on each side behind the matte. I just lined up the picture how i liked it in the frame, added a couple pieces of tape to hold it in one spot, and it turned out nice
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but plastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality frame but was a little disappointed with the plastic instead of glass. Frame and mat look great and display photos very well.
customer_reviews.author: Titan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not glass
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it was glass. Otherwise a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great frames! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking at having custom frames made, but since out prints were relatively standard sizes figured we'd try Amazon first and boy am I glad we did! We ordered 6 frames and they were all excellent quality, especially for the very reasonable price. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: like it was meant to be
customer_reviews.text: In a major twist for those following my reviews, this is a simple black wood frame. I bought two, they performs well at their task of holding pictures, like it was meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for the price. It's not ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for the price. It's not especially fancy, but it doesn't need to be. I bought it to frame a print I got as a gift, and its neutral black goes well with the piece.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good glass alternative frame.
customer_reviews.text: Okay was really Surprised at how nice these are. They display the art work beautifully. Definitely a good alternative if your looking for something that isn’t glass.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money, so much so that I bought more of them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they are so easy to use and they look great on the wall, it even makes a picture of me look good, which is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Hoverrat

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this seller do not buy the frame was blurry ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this seller do not buy the frame was blurry and not clear really any picture cannot be seen in the plastic cover in this frame. Worst purchase I have made. Not exaggerating but really save your money I didn't listen to the reviews but they were right.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia_20

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely an inferior product compared to most frames out there, especially with the woodwork. And the screen of the frame is actually plastic, not glass. However, one plus point was that the plastic screen was covered in film on both sides, which really blocked all the dust that would usually stick to the plastic. And IT WAS A LOT CHEAPER, at least by $10, than other frames that look superficially similar to this one. So I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharanth Kumarasivan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Nice, clean-look frame. No nonsense. Everything you need in a plain ole black frame.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great basic frame
customer_reviews.text: Great frame- nothing fancy, but that's what I was looking for! Don't forget to remove the film from the "glass" (actually a durable piece of plastic/acrylic) once you receive it. I almost did, but ended up ditching it altogether as I wanted the texture of the item I was framing to show. Great price, good quality, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made cheaply, hence why you pay a cheap price. Works for what I need but not exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Starling

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for the price. You can easily see the seams in the corner but at this price I guess that is to be expected
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor poor poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the poorest quality frame and acrylic I have ever seen. Acrylic is thin, arrived cracked around the edges, and is not even close to being clear or scratch free to be able to display a picture. As instructed, I did remove the film on the acrylic and it was still hideously cloudy and scratched.
customer_reviews.author: clesook

customer_reviews.title: Really Worth It
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The acrylic, of course, won't break and it seems more fingerprint resistant than glass. The frames are well constructed and the backs are particularly good. I have a boatload of framed pictures in my house and I used to prefer another (slightly cheaper) brand, but I'm totally converted.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P King

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Literally piece of crap. Good to frame another piece of crap. Low quality, cheap Chinese frame with thin plexiglas instead of glass. Very disappointed! It looks like a great deal for $15 vs. $60 advertised. In fact $3 is ok price for this junk.
customer_reviews.author: vadim daskal

customer_reviews.title: Would like to see these come with white frames and other ...
customer_reviews.text: As promoted. White frame, white mat. Fits 8X10 picture. Would like to see these come with white frames and other color mats and other color frames and white mats.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, not glass
customer_reviews.text: I like these frames, and ended up keeping them. But the material covering the picture is plastic, not glass. That was not clear to me in the product description. I really would have preferred glass, but settled for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Valley

customer_reviews.title: Need contact from seller
customer_reviews.text: We bought this months ago but have been unable to hang it because we don’t have any of the clips to hold the picture and mat in place. I would gladly buy them if I could figure out what they’re called.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Parsekian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to frame a painting I bought and it was perfect. It truly added to my piece of art and made it look like it was in a gallery. Great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame
customer_reviews.text: Nice wood frame, well constructed. The mat is cut to perfect size and the convenience of having the hardware attached is great. I'll be purchasing more in the future. I forgot to mention they give a beautiful look to my monochromatic etchings.
customer_reviews.author: David Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame, messy protective sheet.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is nice but the plastic sheet on top came with glue marks on it that I can't get off. I was too excited to frame a signed print in my toddler's room so I already disposed of the wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice Frame
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Steampunk cat picture. The price was in nice and the frame was better quality than I expected for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very light picture frames
customer_reviews.text: These picture frames are great! They are light and easy to hang. The protective covering over the plastic keeps the picture looking great! Perfect for families with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mat needs to be better
customer_reviews.text: The frame is good, but the mat is a cheap white.
customer_reviews.author: A&P Folman

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The photo protector is plastic and the matting had marks on it. Since this was part of a gift, I didn't have enough time to replace it. A little disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Brackney

customer_reviews.title: took me a minute to figure out
customer_reviews.text: Like others have noted, the frame arrived with the "glass" (plastic) looking somewhat opaque. I was about to pack this up to send it back when I realized the "glass" was covered in plastic film on both sides. I peeled off the film and - voila! Clear "glass" which makes for a very lightweight frame. It's just fine for the price - a basic black wood frame that has the added bonus of being shatterproof, something that actually matters here in earthquake country.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ray

customer_reviews.title: decent quality frame that would be great for kids' rooms (my reason for purchasing) or other ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a picture frame that didn't have a glass front (this one is plexi-glass), and this frame fit the bill. It's an inexpensive, decent quality frame that would be great for kids' rooms (my reason for purchasing) or other areas where added safety is desired.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R.

customer_reviews.title: We purchased four of these and got four different colors ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four of these and got four different colors of "white" for the mats- some way more cream than white...we intended on having them displayed next to each other so this wasn't a possibility given the range of mat colors...likely they were old or had just faded - not sure but very sloppy work and we had to send them back and purchase from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Plexiglass not glass
customer_reviews.text: They use plexiglass and this plastic tints whatever you're framing yellow, so the nice white mat looks ivory, looks old.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: nothing so bad I would go through the trouble to return it ...
customer_reviews.text: It was OK, it came with a scratch on the front, nothing so bad I would go through the trouble to return it but it was noticeable. I used a little white out to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: it left a dull residue. The clear insert is plastic
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write negative reviews, but thought I should warn consumers. I should have listened to other reviews! The quality of this frame is awful. The frame itself was filthy and scuffed. Even after washing it, it left a dull residue. The clear insert is plastic; not glass! And it was bubbling in places. Very poor quality. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mahaney

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My prints look great in the frames I purchased. I read that you need to remove the film from the clear plastic protection and I am happy with my frames and recommend them to anyone who wants a good deal and a nice frame.
customer_reviews.author: CallieGirl86

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, attractive frame. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking frame
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Very nice looking frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic is a great, lightweight touch
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight option. I was looking for a frame that was for hanging only (no stand up option). The frame and mat are wonderful for the price. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame just doesn't have glass it's a plastic piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice frame just doesn't have glass it's a plastic piece instead good if it falls but expected glass wood frame
customer_reviews.author: Ronboy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, not glass?
customer_reviews.text: Overall, works fine as expected. Wasn't expecting there to plastic instead of glass inside the frame. This detail is not mentioned in the description...hence 3 stars. The plastic has a shine, but obviously not as reflective as traditional glass.
customer_reviews.author: caceewalker

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice lightweight frame
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lightweight frame! They come packaged very well, with their own box per each frame, and bubble wrap around the frame to protect it. Be sure to peel off the thin film that comes on the glass so you have a nice clear surface. I was very happy with how my artwork turned out once framed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey P.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this frame due to the negative reviews however I'm glad I did. When I first got it out of the package I was horrified at how cheap the plexiglass looked. Upon closer inspection, I realized it had a protective film on both sides that gave it it's cloudy appearance. Once removed, looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice frame
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive frame. I was perfectly happy with this product and think it will look nice hanging in my friend's baby nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: These frames were easy to use and install pictures I was giving as a gift. I told the recipient that if she did not like the pictures, throw them away but keep the frames as they are so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Larson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice. A little expensive, but I have no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for the project. I took off 2 stars because one of the corners was chipped. Otherwise, the product arrived as described.
customer_reviews.author: KiraBlue

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Not at all accurate with the measurement. I really regret buying this product and fooled by the measurement. It is slightly larger on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Huaming Yu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - and simple design. I've ordered several of these for the prints I've gotten off etsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kearns

customer_reviews.title: These frames are GREAT! Exceeded my expectations for an inexpensive frame to ...
customer_reviews.text: These frames are GREAT! Exceeded my expectations for an inexpensive frame to make 8x10 prints look fantastic. Simple and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: obiwan

customer_reviews.title: The frame and mat are nice though.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to have glass in it. Especially with it saying it was originally a $40 frame. The frame and mat are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Crystle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I expected for the price. Not super high quality but nice enough to put wedding photos in and give as gifts. I got one in white and one in black.
customer_reviews.author: JNHMA

customer_reviews.title: My mom needed it today as a gift and the ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom needed it today as a gift and the glass had a chip in it. Since it was for today, she kept it. Not the quality she was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looking
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase - made what I put it stand out - a very good quality - the mat is perfect very pleased with this would suggest anybody who needs a frame to get it. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Vespa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap, and kinda cheap looking too. Didn't know it used plastic instead of glass.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJMU

customer_reviews.title: cheap frames, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: What was I thinking when I ordered these cheap frames? Oh yeah, they are cheap and you get what you pay for! There is no glass but plastic and matting is low quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Cowmanj

customer_reviews.title: Check before disposing of packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great frames and just opened after delivery 2 months ago but one frame damaged.
customer_reviews.author: che t.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the quality I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: The wood is painted somewhat poorly and the front is plastic, not glass. They are worth maybe $9 apiece. They look nice enough but aren't awesome.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems with the acrylic looking blurry. Great price for the product and was exactly what I needed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: xtinaxmariex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent made the picture look professional and was very reasonable in price.
customer_reviews.author: Nighthawk779

customer_reviews.title: Very scratched.
customer_reviews.text: My frame was completely scratched all over the front. Very disappointed. I was in a crunch and needed a frame for a gift and when I open it to see its scraped to pieces I was not happy. I thought it would be a glass cover and it's plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Measurements wrong
customer_reviews.text: Mat board size is incorrect and arrived not as advertised. Will be returning. Mat opening is closer to 7.5x9.5 NOT 8x10.
customer_reviews.author: celestina w.

customer_reviews.title: the "glass" aka plastic that is in the frame was ...
customer_reviews.text: the "glass" aka plastic that is in the frame was a little cheesy but the frame and gist I used it for was gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not notice upon ordering that it has no glass - only a thick plastic cover
customer_reviews.author: ttt875

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!  Plastic frame.  Mine arrived horribly scratched.
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst frames I have ever owned. Promptly returned it. Not only is the cover plastic but the plastic cover arrived horribly scratched. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: NickInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Plastic covering seems cheap and potentially scratches easily.
customer_reviews.text: Frame is decent for the price. Plastic covering seems cheap and potentially scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Frame
customer_reviews.text: Very nice frame for documents...I may purchase more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle37

customer_reviews.title: The frame is fine but there is a sticker on the front of ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame is fine but there is a sticker on the front of the plastic glass that serves no purpose(!!!!!) except to say "To Remove Peel Here" and is impossible to get off! I spent 15 minutes trying to remove it and damaged the plastic in the process. So frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Emily Houghton

customer_reviews.title: quality ok
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to find two frames for such a reasonable rate. The quality is fine, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: delmarwalker

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: The acrylic sheet is opaque and there are scratches on it. It's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Well made frame!  Good price, too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed the wood frame (black with white mat) for and looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it came from the bottom of a 99 cent ...
customer_reviews.text: I only paid $13.50 for this, and I still feel cheated. Looks like it came from the bottom of a 99 cent bin.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Not super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Not super high quality. Make sure you are aware it has plastic instead of glass. I didn't read that and was a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: storytank

customer_reviews.title: it seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: The "glass" is actually acrylic. Other that that, it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: SmoothCriminalCram

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good basic frame with nice mat at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Could've gone to the Dollar Tree for the same frame....
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality of this frame. It looks cheap, feels cheap. It actually looks like something I could buy at the dollar tree. I can't believe the "list price" on this is $60. For $15, go to Kohls, Hobby Lobby, etc. and get a higher quality product for your $15.
customer_reviews.author: E. Driggers

customer_reviews.title: Great frames. Easy to put whatever you want in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great frames. Easy to put whatever you want in them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weece

customer_reviews.title: ... price was less expensive but the frame wasn't as good quality as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The price was less expensive but the frame wasn't as good quality as I expected. Frame doesn't have a stand so they must be hung or leaned against a wall. One of the two frames I purchased hand a crack in the clear plastic cover..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking mat. Makes it look professionally done with this look for 8x10 photos.
customer_reviews.author: ShortandSweet

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice frame. Nice and sturdy. Perfect space for framing an old LIFE magazine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Correct size, but product was scratched upon arrival. Still works though...
customer_reviews.author: WakeUpEvery1Top Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for pictures from a recent cruise
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for pictures from a recent cruise. Had to trim the pictures slightly as cruise prints are an odd size.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

product_meta.title: Golden State Art 11x14 Photo Wood Frame with Mat for 8x10 Picture BLACK
product_meta.description:
Size:11x14| Color:Black

Assembled and Manufactured by Golden State Art. 

A Modern Style 11x14 Black Wood Frame that can be place in any room, either portrait or landscape on the wall. Frame Includes Acrylic and a Single White Mat. Back has Turning Hardware clips & 2 Attached Sawtooth Foldable Hinged Hanger. Display your pictures with it. Great Product to put in family or wedding photos, art prints, and other pictures!
feature_bullets: MODERN DESIGN: Black Color, Wood Frame - Smooth Finished | Overall Dimensions - 12.6 x 15.6 x 0.75 inches | Molding: 1-Inch Wide and 0.75-Inch Thick
FIT AND DISPLAY PHOTO PRINT: 8x10 inch (with White Mat) Or 11x14 inch (without the mat)

PACKAGE INCLUDES: One 11x14 lightweight frame with a single Beveled Cut White Mat (white core and 4-ply thick, about 1.4 mm or 1/16 inch). Mat Opening/Inner Size: 7.5x9.5 inches (for 8x10 picture/photo print)

EASY TO INSTALL: Back has Turning Hardware clips & 2 Attached Sawtooth Foldable Hinged Hangers. The Turning Hardware clips can swap out photos easier than the tabs that other frames use. The hangers can wall hang the frame horizontally or vertically.
IMPORTANT NOTE: Before putting your photo in the frame, Remove the Protective Film from front and back of the Acrylic sheet. Photo Frame assemble Instructions are included.
